user_agent_settings.description: User agent configuration for web requests. Update chrome_version and user agent strings to match latest browser versions for better YouTube compatibility.

cookie_settings.description: Cookie configuration for YouTube access. Set enabled to true to use cookies. Method can be 'browser' (uses browser cookies) or 'file' (uses cookies.txt file). For browser method, specify browser_name (chrome, firefox, safari, edge, opera, brave). For file method, specify cookies_file_path.

description: Configuration file for YouTube Video Crawler. Set debug_mode to true for detailed logging, adjust target_videos_per_query for collection size, modify search_queries array to change what videos to search for, set user_agent to specify browser user agent string, set download_method to 'api_assisted' (recommended) or 'yt_dlp_only', set yt_dlp_primary to true (uses youtube_audio_downloader.py as primary) or false (uses youtube_audio_downloader_alternative.py as primary), and configure cookie_settings for enhanced access to YouTube content.
